name: Apply for an HM Armed Forces Veteran Card
synonyms: Apply for a Veteran’s ID Card
description: An HM Armed Forces Veteran Card is a way to prove that you served in the UK armed forces. The card can make it quicker and easier to apply for support as a veteran.
theme: Citizenship and living in the UK

items.label: Service starts issuing cards to personnel as they leave the military

links.text: News story: New veterans ID cards rolled out to service leavers
